languages.text: Покрытые огромным слоем пыли ящики с оборудованием, все еще находящимся в отличном состоянии. Будто бы даже перед лицом смерти техножрецы не могли себе позволить оскорбить духов машин небрежной эксплуатацией.

traits.locale_text: Покрытые огромным слоем пыли ящики с оборудованием в отличном состоянии. Будто бы даже перед лицом смерти техножрецы не могли себе позволить оскорбить духов машин небрежной эксплуатацией их вместилищ.

languages.text: All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.
languages.original_text: Покрытые огромным слоем пыли ящики с оборудованием, все еще находящимся в отличном состоянии. Будто бы даже перед лицом смерти техножрецы не могли себе позволить оскорбить духов машин небрежной эксплуатацией.

traits.locale_text: All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment which is still in prime condition. It's as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests wouldn't dare offend the machine spirits by handling it carelessly.

All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment which is still in prime condition. It's as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests wouldn't dare offend the machine spirits by handling it carelessly.

All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment, still in prime condition. It's as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests wouldn't dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment carelessly.

All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment, still in prime condition. It's as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests wouldn't dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment carelessly.

All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.

All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.

languages.text: Estas cajas, prácticamente sepultadas por el polvo, contienen equipo en perfecto estado. Es como si los tecnosacerdotes no se atrevieran a ofender a los espíritus máquina al no ofrecerles la máxima reverencia, ni siquiera al enfrentarse a la misma muerte.
languages.original_text: All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.

traits.locale_text: Estas cajas, prácticamente sepultadas por el polvo, contienen equipo en perfecto estado. Es como si los tecnosacerdotes no se atrevieran a ofender a los espíritus máquina con un trato descuidado ni al enfrentarse a la misma muerte.

languages.text: Presque enterrées sous une épaisse couche de poussière, ces caisses contiennent de l'équipement en parfait état. C'est à croire que, même face à la mort, les technoprêtres n'ont pas voulu risquer d'offenser les esprits de la machine en manipulant le matériel sans lui montrer toute la déférence qui lui est due.
languages.original_text: All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.

traits.locale_text: Presque enterrées sous une épaisse couche de poussière, ces caisses contiennent de l'équipement en parfait état. C'est à croire que, même face à la mort, les technoprêtres n'ont pas voulu risquer d'offenser les esprits de la machine en manipulant le matériel imprudemment.

languages.text: 分厚い埃の層に大部分が埋もれていたが、この箱の中の備品はまだ新品同然だ。技術司祭たちは死に瀕してさえ、畏敬の念を欠くように備品を扱うことで、機械精霊を怒らせたくなかったようだ。
languages.original_text: All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.

traits.locale_text: 分厚い埃の層に大部分が埋もれていたが、この箱の中の備品はまだ新品同然だ。技術司祭たちは死に瀕してさえ、畏敬の念を欠くように備品を扱うことで、機械精霊を怒らせたくなかったようだ。

languages.text: 这些箱子掩盖在厚厚的灰尘下面，里面的设备依然完好无损。看起来，那些技术神甫即便是面临死亡时，也依然满怀敬意地对待这些设备，以免招致机魂的愤怒。
languages.original_text: All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.

traits.locale_text: 这些箱子掩盖在厚厚的灰尘下面，里面的设备依然完好无损。看起来，那些技术祭司即便是面临死亡时，也不敢粗心大意地胡乱处置这些设备，以免招致机魂的愤怒。

languages.text: Diese Kisten liegen förmlich unter einer dicken Staubschicht begraben. Sie enthalten Ausrüstungsgegenstände, teilweise in erstklassigem Zustand. Es ist, als würden die Techpriester es nicht einmal im Angesicht des Todes wagen, die Maschinengeister zu beleidigen, indem sie nicht ehrfürchtig genug mit der Ausrüstung umgehen.
languages.original_text: All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kisten liegen förmlich unter einer dicken Staubschicht begraben. Sie enthalten Ausrüstungsgegenstände, teilweise in erstklassigem Zustand. Es ist, als würden die Techpriester es nicht einmal im Angesicht des Todes wagen, die Maschinengeister zu beleidigen, indem sie die achtlos mit der Ausrüstung umgehen.

languages.text: Her şey kalın bir toz tabakasının altına gömülü olsa da ekipmanlarla dolu bu sandıklar hâlâ iyi durumda. Tekno Rahipler, ölümle burun buruna olduklarında bile ekipmanlara hürmetle muamele edip makine ruhlarını öfkelendirmemek için ellerinden geleni yapmışlar gibi.
languages.original_text: All but buried under a thick layer of dust, these crates contain equipment still in prime condition. It is as though even in the face of death, the Tech-Priests would not dare offend the machine spirits by handling the equipment with anything less than reverence.
